TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapAttributes extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示特性对象的集合，这些对象控制 如何序列化和反序列化 SOAP 方法。

span.span: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the serializes and deserializes SOAP methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建是重写默认的进程的一部分方式序列化类实例。Creating a is part of a process that overrides the default way the serializes class instances. 例如，假设你想要序列化创建从 dll 导出的源不可访问的对象。For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL that has an inaccessible source. 通过使用类，你可以增加或其他方式控制如何序列化对象。By using the class, you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized. 成员类直接对应于一系列控制序列化的属性类。The members of the class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization. 例如，属性必须设置为，该编辑器可以通过指示重写的字段或属性的序列化序列化编码的 SOAP 特性的属性值。For example, the property must be set to a , which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the to serialize the property value as an encoded SOAP attribute. 用于控制编码的 SOAP 序列化的属性的完整列表，请参阅[属性，控制编码 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md)。For a complete list of attributes that control encoded SOAP serialization, see [Attributes That Control Encoded SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/attributes-that-control-encoded-soap-serialization.md). 有关将实例添加更多细节类的实例类，请参阅类概述。For more details about adding an instance of the class to an instance of the class, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即创建相应的属性设置，并添加到。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，且用于创建可重写默认的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于重写其序列化每个成员或类实例，必须创建一个新。For each member or class instance whose serialization is being overridden, you must create a new . 设置的属性一样使用适合于成员或对象，然后将添加到实例类。Set the properties for the as appropriate to the member or object, then add the to an instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即创建相应的属性设置，并添加到。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，且用于创建可重写默认的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. span.span: A that overrides the behavior of the when the member is serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果没有特性应用到一个公共字段或公共读/写属性，会将它序列化为的 XML 元素。By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element. 你还可以指示若要将成员序列化为编码 SOAP XML 特性，通过应用到字段或属性。You can also instruct the to serialize a member as an encoded SOAP XML attribute by applying a to the field or property. (必须用来创建以便将对象序列化编码 SOAP XML 流的形式。)(The must be created with an in order to serialize an object as an encoded SOAP XML stream.) 属性允许你重写通过应用控制的序列化给的成员。The property allows you to override the serialization controlled by applying a to the member. 有关此过程的更多详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more details on this process, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即创建相应的属性设置，并添加到。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，且用于创建可重写默认的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 元素或属性的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.

value.span: 表示 XML 元素或特性的默认值的对象。

span.span: An object that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过应用设置成员的默认值属性成员。The default value of a member can be set by applying a attribute to the member. 如果成员被序列化为编码的 SOAP 消息，你可以通过创建新更改默认值，设置其属性与设置对对象的属性。If the member is being serialized as an encoded SOAP message, you can change the default value by creating a new , setting its property, and setting the property to the object. 添加到。Add the to a . 有关更多详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more details, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`包括名为的字段`GroupName`。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that includes a field named `GroupName`. 默认值设置到".NET"。The default value is set with the to ".NET". 通过未设置该字段，或将其设置为".NET"，值是不会序列化 （因为已经知道默认值）。By either not setting the field, or by setting it to ".NET", the value is not serialized (because the default value is already known). 该示例还重写中的默认值`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，它由调用`SerializeOverride`方法。The sample also overrides the default value in the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, which is called by the `SerializeOverride` method. 该示例将调用这两种方法，`SerializeOriginal`和`SerializeOverride`，并将相同的值 (".NET") 设置为`GroupName`字段。The example calls both methods, `SerializeOriginal` and `SerializeOverride`, and sets the same value (".NET") for the `GroupName` field. 由于重写时，值序列化，仅在调用时`SerializeOverride`方法。Because of the override, the value is serialized only when calling the `SerializeOverride` method. [!code-cpp[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/CPP/defvalue.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/CS/defvalue.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttribues.SoapDefaultValue/VB/defvalue.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于控制视为 XML 元素的类成员序列化。The is used to control the serialization of a class member as an XML element. 设置到新的属性以通过创建一个新的重写类成员的序列化的 XML 元素形式并将其分配给属性。Set the property to a new to override the serialization of a class member as an XML element by creating a new and assigning it to the property. 然后添加到。Then add the to a . 创建与，然后构造与。Create an with the , then construct an with the . 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Transportation`。The following example serializes a class named `Transportation`. 序列化`Vehicle`字段中被重写。The serialization of the `Vehicle` field is overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即创建相应的属性设置，并添加到。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，且用于创建可重写默认的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/CPP/soapelementoverrides.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/CS/soapelementoverrides.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapElementOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapElementOverrides/VB/soapelementoverrides.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 如何序列化 SOAP 枚举。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a SOAP enumeration.

value.span: 一个对象，指定 如何序列化一个枚举成员。

span.span: An object that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于控制的序列化枚举成员。The is used to control the serialization of an enumeration member. 设置到新的属性重写此类成员的序列化。Set the property to a new to override the serialization of such a member. 有关详细信息，请参阅类概述。For more information, see the class overview. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为的两个类序列化为`Food`和`FoodType`。The following example serializes two classes named `Food` and `FoodType`. `FoodType`类包含两个枚举已重写，并为每个枚举，该示例创建它分配给属性。The `FoodType` class contains two enumerations that are overridden, and for each enumeration, the example creates a that it assigns to the property of a . 然后该示例添加到，用于创建。The example then adds the to a , which is used to create an . [!code-cpp[SoapEnumOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapEnumOverrides/CPP/soapenumoverrides.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapEnumOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapEnumOverrides/CS/soapenumoverrides.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapEnumOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapEnumOverrides/VB/soapenumoverrides.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 是否将公共字段或属性序列化为经过编码的 SOAP XML。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the serializes a public field or property as encoded SOAP XML.

value.span: 如果 不得序列化字段或属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，所有公共字段和公共读/写属性序列化。By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the . 也就是说，每个公共字段或属性的值仍保持为 XML 元素或 XML 文档中的 XML 特性。That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML document. 若要重写的默认序列化的字段或属性，请创建，并设置其属性`true`。To override the default serialization of a field or property, create a , and set its property to `true`. 使用方法将对象添加到并指定包含的字段或属性，若要忽略的对象的类型和字段或属性，若要忽略的名称。Use the method to add the object to a and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore and the name of the field or property to ignore. 如果应用于字段或属性，忽略的字段或属性。If a is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored. 但是通过创建重写该行为，设置其属性`false`，并将其添加到，指定包含的字段或属性的对象的类型和字段或属性的名称.However you can override that behavior by creating a , setting its property to `false`, and adding it to a , specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property and the name of the field or property. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即创建相应的属性设置，并添加到。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，且用于创建可重写默认的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于控制生成的 XML 流。The can be used to control the XML stream generated by the . 设置到新的属性对架构进行控制的序列化类时，将生成 XML。Set the property to a new to control the schema for the XML that is generated when a class is serialized. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化类名为`Group`。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. 序列化`GroupName`和`IgnoreThis`字段和的成员`GroupType`枚举将被重写。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在`CreateOverrideSerializer`方法，已创建，，并为每个重写的成员或枚举即创建相应的属性设置，并添加到。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 使用创建，且用于创建可重写默认的序列化。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization.
